#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,n,m,k;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		cin>>s;
		int temp=s[0];
		int count=0,flag=1,ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
		  if(s[i]==temp)
		  {
  			count++;
  		  }
		  else
		  {
		  	if(count/k)
		  	flag=0;
  			ans+=count/k;
  			if(count%k)
  			ans+=1;
  			//cout<<count<<"\n";
  			count=1;
  			temp=s[i];
  		  }		
		}
           if(count/k)
		  	flag=0;
  			ans+=count/k;
  			if(count%k)
  			ans+=1;
  			//cout<<flag<<"\n";
	
	if(flag)
	cout<<-1<<"\n";
	else
	cout<<ans<<"\n";	
		
	}
	
}
